title.rendered: H.E. Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received the official visit of H.E. Mr. Olushegun Adjadi Bakari, Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Benin

content.rendered:
Today, 29th September, 2023 the Hon. Minister of Foreign Affairs, H.E. Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received the official visit of H.E. Mr. Olushegun Adjadi Bakari, Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Benin. On his delegation was Mr. Amour- Marie Ako, Director, Africa and Middle East in the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.
The visiting Minister was accompanied to the Ministry by the Beninois Ambassador to Nigeria, H.E. Marcelline Adjovi Yekpe.
Discussions centred on bilateral cooperation.
